description: Yes, there is a lot to do, but I'll let you in on a really helpful feature of this world. Look at your inventory; see the things on the left and right of it? You should see a bunch of items and blocks. That's your /b/Recipe Electronic Interface/b/ or as I will mention it as: **/b/REI/b/**. This is a massive database of everything in your world.

This REI uses the electrical signals in your nervous to power the knowledge center in your brain to display recipes and uses for items, blocks, tools, armor, plants, foods, entities, special procedues, structues and more. Use your REI to your advantage as it will be a huge help as your journey.
